MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the L23 postcode area of Liverpool,  this is causing reduced power to a number of properties affecting supplies in Brownmoor Lane, Victoria Road West and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:52AM.  Our emergency response team is on route to investigate and will commence repairs to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. Once we receive information from them we will make every effort to let you know when the power will be restored. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4PM on 12th October 2020
